title: The Kindness Fairy
description: Everyone and everything can use a little kindness including people, animals and our planet. Follow the kindness fairy and her magical friends in this sweet story as we travel together spreading kindness and cheer.Children will delight in being able to spot and find “acts of kindness” as we visit areas in our community including the park, supermarket, and even the zoo - after all animals need and show kindness too!An entertaining and educational book filled with beautiful illustrations and real-life examples of how kindness can be shared each and every day.Parents, teachers and caregivers will appreciate the real-life examples and lessons woven throughout the story. This book is perfect for classrooms and curriculum development around social-emotional skills and building character.Suggested 3 - 10 yearsTHEMES KindnessCompassionGenerositySharingHelping othersTaking turnsFamily and friendshipsVolunteeringAnimal behaviorsPicking up Litter and RecyclingCaring for the environmentUsing your imaginationSpecial A section at the end of the book provides real practical examples of how children can use and show kindness in their lives each and every day.
author: Echo Morgan
